name: 楊士萱
objective: 0. 簡介 第一部份：源編碼 1. 源編碼定理與熵 2. 非失真壓縮：runlength, Huffman, arithmetic, Lempel-Ziv, * 3. 碼率-失真定理 4. 失真壓縮：量化、預測技術、轉換與次頻帶編碼、MPEG 第二部分：通道編碼 5. 通道編碼定理與通訊容量 6. 有限場簡介7. 區塊碼：CRC, Hamming, Golay, BCH, Reed-Solomon, * 8. 迴旋碼 9. 編碼調變）
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Weeks 2,3: Discrete sources and entropy 
Week 4:Statistical lossless compression: runlength codes, Golomb codes, Huffman codes and arithmetic codes; coding for sources with memory
Week 5: Dictionary-based lossless compression: Lempel-Ziv coding
Week 5: Channels and channel capacity
Weeks 6-8: Finite fields
Week 9: MidTerm Exam
Weeks 10,11: Linear block codes
Weeks 12,13: Cyclic codes
Week 14: BCH codes 
Week 15: Reed-Solomon codes
Week 16: Convolutional codes
Week 17: Turbo codes, Low-density parity-check (LDPC) codes
Week 18: Final Exam
materials:
Textbooks: 
1.Lecture notes and 訊號壓縮原理(節錄)。
2.資料壓縮，戴顯權編著，紳藍出版社。　　
3.Error Control Coding second edition by S. Lin and D. J. Costello, Jr., Pearson Educational Inc., 2004.

References: 
1.Data Compression by David Salomon, 3rd Edition, Springer-Verlag Inc., 2004. (a good reference for various compression algorithms, lossless and lossy)
2.Applied Coding and Information Theory for Engineers by Richard B. Wells, Prentice-Hall Inc., 1999. （高立圖書代理）
3.The Data Compression Book, 2nd edition by M. Nelson and J.-L. Gailly, M & T Books, 1996.
4.Text Compression by T. C. Bell, J. G. Cleary, and I. H. Witten, Prentice-Hall Inc., 1990.
5.多媒體通訊，戴顯權編著，紳藍出版社，2002。
6.The Art of Error Correcting Coding by R. H. Morelos-Zaragoza, John Wiley & Sons, 2002. (Web site: the-art-of-ecc.com, containing programs written in C language)
7.Error-Control Coding for Data Networks by I. S. Reed and X. Chen, Kluwer Academic Publishers, 1999. (Good source for RS codes)
8.Turbo Coding by C. Heegard and S. B. Wicker, Kluwer Academic Publishers, 1999.
9.Convolutional Coding: Fundamentals and Applications by C. Lee, Artech House Inc., 1997
